extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to analyze a Java project
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Pedro Pereira, Pedro Pinheiro, Tiago Mendes

    • Method Detail

      • formatString

        private static java.lang.String formatString​(java.lang.String method)
        Parameters:
        method - is a String with the name, arguments and modifier of a given method
        Returns:
        String formatted containing just the arguments of the method

      • getMetricsForExcel

        private static void getMetricsForExcel​(java.io.File packageFile,
                                       java.lang.String[] lines,
                                       int counter,
                                       java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> linesOfMethods,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> cycloOfAllMethods)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        packageFile - is the java file that will be analyzed
        lines - is a String array that contains the information to be inserted in each row of the excel sheet by the ExcelDealer
        counter - used to get the LOC_method and CYCLO_method metrics
        linesOfMethods - This is the given LinkedHashMap which contains the methods names and corresponding lines of code.
        cycloOfAllMethods - is an arrayList of Integer that given a map of methods and their lines of code, returns the cyclo value of each of them
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • getInformationForExcel

        private static void getInformationForExcel​(java.io.File current,
                                           java.io.File packageFile,
                                           java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> methods,
                                           java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> linesOfMethods,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> cycloOfAllMethods,
                                           int counter,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> result)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        current - represents the project directory
        packageFile - is the java file that will be analyzed
        methods - is a LinkedHashSet that contains the names, arguments and modifiers of the methods of the java file in Strings
        linesOfMethods - This is the given LinkedHashMap which contains the methods names and corresponding lines of code.
        counter - used to get the LOC_method and CYCLO_method metrics
        cycloOfAllMethods - is an arrayList of Integer that given a map of methods and their lines of code, returns the cyclo value of each of them
        result - contains the information that will later be used to fill in each row of the excel sheet (this will be done with the ExcelDealer)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • readJavaProject

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> readJavaProject​(java.lang.String pathProject)
                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        pathProject - This is the string representation of the path to the project chosen in the GUI
        Returns:
        List where each String array contains the information that will later be used to fill in each row of the excel sheet (this will be done with the ExcelDealer)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
